ygData.subject: Re: Gynok's Placeholders
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, There has been some excellent posts on Gynok placeholders.  I was earlier under the impression that the place holder roamed lvl three cause I ve killed
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

There has been some excellent posts on Gynok placeholders. I was
earlier under the impression that the place holder roamed lvl three
cause I've killed it while camping a spot that was out of the way. I
would lend support to the theory that it takes up a stationary residence
at a random spot on lvl 3.

Knowing the locations of the spawns on lvl three I have noticed
irregularaties which I now believe to be the Gynok placeholder. Knowing
what i have learned from these posts I don't believe it is necessary to
clear lvl 3 to kill the placeholder. I think I'd have a good chance at
sniping the culprit. If you don't know the floor, two spawns that are
standing unusually close to each other are is a good place to start.

I have never been in Befallen to camp Gynok but my 29 Druid has two
kills while my Cleric was getting to lvl 20 in Befallen. The 29 Druid
pretty much had the run of the place except for the odd Ghoul and
Thaumalurgist that wanted a piece. Those Thaumalurgists are nasty.

Abnuo, 27 Cleric on the Rathe




> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
